articles.title: Ripple разорвала сотрудничество с MoneyGram - http://forklog.com/
articles.description: Ripple прекратила сотрудничество с сервисом денежных переводов MoneyGram. Об этом сообщил CEO калифорнийской компании Брэд Гарлингхаус. Today, we’re announcing that Ripple and MGI have together decided to wind down our current partnership agreement, and are b…
articles.content:
Ripple MoneyGram. CEO .
Today, were announcing that Ripple and MGI have together decided to wind down our current partnership agreement, and are both committed to revisiting it in the future. See ou… [+456 chars]
